comments: Abolished 1.4.1933 and added to the parish of Pitminster.

Abolished 25.3.1885 and divided between the parishes of 
    Bishop's Hull Within, Bishop's Hull Without and Oake. See also Table 2, notes 
    (a) and 
    (c).

Transferred from Devon to Somerset on 30.9.1896. See also Table 
    2, note (k).
Abolished 1.4.1933 and added to the parish of Norton Fitzwarren.
Renamed 1952 to become the parish of Kingston St. Mary.

Abolished 25.3.1885 and divided between the parishes of St. James 
    Within, St. James Without, Staplegrove and Kingston.

Abolished 25.3.1885 and divided between the parishes of Taunton 
    St. Mary Magdalen Within, Taunton St. Mary Magdalen Without and Stoke St. Mary.
Abolished 1.4.1933 and added to the parish of Orchard Portman.
Abolished 9.11.1921 and added to the parish of Taunton.
